events.message: I just received my new laptop, but the screen has multiple scratches and some dead pixels. This is really disappointing.
The issue has been categorized as Product Defect based on the customer's description of scratches and dead pixels on the screen.
A support agent specializing in hardware issues has been assigned to handle this case and provide a resolution.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear about the scratches on your laptop screen. I’m here to assist you and make sure we resolve this quickly.
Could you please provide photos of the scratches and dead pixels? Also, confirm if the package was damaged upon arrival.
I’ve attached several photos showing the damaged screen. The box was intact, so the damage must have happened before shipping.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer to replace your laptop with a new unit at no extra cost or provide a full refund if you prefer.
I appreciate the quick response. I would prefer a replacement instead of a refund. Please let me know the next steps.
We have arranged for a replacement laptop to be shipped immediately. You will receive tracking details shortly. The defective unit can be returned with the prepaid shipping label included.
Checking in to confirm you have received and are satisfied with your replacement laptop. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
As there have been no further issues reported, we will now close this support case. Thank you for your patience and cooperation.
You will shortly receive a survey asking for your feedback on how we handled your product defect case. Your input is highly appreciated.
